Transcript: Kevin: Lucy?
Kevin: It's me.

Lucy: Doc? Oh, my -- oh, my God. Oh! Oh! Oh, my God! It is you! It's really 
you! You're home. You're home! You're -- you're home!
Kevin: I can't believe it, I'm home!

Lucy: I can't believe it, either. Listen, I never thought I'd see you again. 
I didn't think I would ever touch you like this or hold you.
Kevin: I know, I know, I know. I know the feeling.

Lucy: Ok, tell me everything. Where were you? What -- wait a minute. That 
doesn't matter. Hold on. Come here.
Kevin: Ow!
Lucy: Ooh --
Kevin: You pinched me!

Lucy: I'm sorry. I -- I just had to pinch you to make sure you're real. You 
are real. I didn't imagine -- you are home. Ow!
Kevin: Do you know I'm real now?
Lucy: Yes, I do.
Kevin: Well, then get over here. You're too far away.
Lucy: Oh, I love you. Oh, I missed you. Oh, Doc!
Livvie: Where are you, Rafe?

Livvie's Voice: So you read the love story I wrote in my private little 
diary. Hot stuff, huh? If this doesn't convince you you're head-over-heels in 
love with me, nothing will.

Livvie: It's a story that's come true. I've fallen in love with you, Rafe. 
Come home to me so we can start the rest of our life together. Now that I 
finally got you away from Alison.
Alison: Rafe?
Rafe: You know me.
Alison: Rafe --
Alison: Did I die? Is that what happened? Did I go to heaven?
Rafe: No, I don't think so.

Alison: So you're really here. You're really back with me? Oh, my God. I 
missed you so much. I missed you so much. Thank you, dear God, for bringing me 
one of your angels.
Rafe: You all right?
Alison: Oh, my God, how long can you stay?
Rafe: "Stay?" I don't even know why I'm here in the first place.
Alison: What?

Rafe: I mean, I was in the hospital and I walked in the door and I -- I saw 
your face. I've seen it in my dreams and I just -- I -- I kissed you. I'm sorry. 
I don't know why. I --
Alison: It's because you -- you missed me as much as I've missed you.
Rafe: How can that be? I don't even know you.
[Captioning made possible by ABC, Inc., and SOAPnet]

Kevin: Oh, let me -- let me just look at you. I thought I'd never see this 
beautiful face again. Lucy, it's all right, I'm home. I'm home.

Lucy: I know. It's just when they told me you were missing, it's like a part 
of me had just died. And then to think some ghost had a 100-year-old grudge and 
lit a candle and made you leave and vanish --

Kevin: Lucy, Rebecca pulled me right through that portrait. I found myself in 
this -- it was like an enchanted limbo. I was trying so hard to make any kind of 
contact with you.
Lucy: Well, you did. You -- you did make contact through Ian.
Kevin: Ian?

Lucy: Yes. Somehow, he -- he talked like you or he kind of could feel what 
you were feeling.
Kevin: But how?

Lucy: I don't know. Maybe it's because we're such good friends or because 
losing Eve was still so close to the surface. But, Doc, that's how I know you 
were with Rebecca.

Kevin: After a while I was starting to wonder if I was making any contact at 
all or if it was -- it was just all in my head.

Lucy: I know. I tried to hold on to hope for so long and then when there was 
so much evidence that you were murdered -- I started believing the worst.

Kevin: I married you. I married you for life. You think I'm going to cut out 
after six months?

Lucy: No. Oh, Doc. We were just so very lucky we got through all of this. I 
wish I could say the same for Alison.
Kevin: Rebecca told me Alison was arrested for my murder?
Lucy: Yeah, but things have gotten even worse.
Kevin: Do you have a phone with you?

Lucy: Oh, oh. Yeah, I -- I wanted to keep it in case I heard any news. Why? 
What are you going to do?

Kevin: I'm going to call the D.A. and tell him he needs to let Alison out of 
jail.
Lucy: What -- no, Doc. It really isn't quite that simple.
Alison: Rafe? It's me. Of course it's me. It's Alison.
Rafe: But no -- no. I -- I met Alison. You're not her.
Alison: My God. Do you not remember? You have to remember.
Jamal: Alison. Alison? Oh, my God. I can't believe it.
Jack: Oh, wait -- Ian? Come see your patient.
Jamal: Hey. How you doing?
Ian: Alison, you're awake?
Alison: Yeah.
Ian: What happened?
Alison: I was -- I was just --
Jack: Wow.
Alison: I was sleeping and then I was dreaming, and Rafe woke me up.
Jack: Dude, I knew if you showed up you could help her. This is, like --
Rafe: You wanted me to come here?
Alison: I really need -- I need to talk to you.
Ian: Hang on. You just relax, ok?
Alison: But, Ian, I --

Ian: Hang on. You collapsed, you had an aneurysm. I -- I can't explain this 
medically. I can't.
Alison: It's because -- it's because he came back to me.
Rafe: Alison?
Woman's Voice: Rafe! Sweetheart, did you miss me?
Livvie's Voice: What are you saying, Rafe? Of course this is Alison.
Woman's Voice: Here, sweetheart, feel. It's me.
Rafe's Voice: You know what? You can go now.
Woman's Voice: She turned you against me, Rafe. That's what feels wrong.

Livvie's Voice: Look at her, Rafe, this is Alison. She shows the world her 
phony sweet side all the time, but this is her. This is the real Alison.
Ian: I'm going to check your vitals.
Alison: But, Ian, please, I really --
Ian: In a minute.
Alison: Just need to speak with Rafe.

Jamal: I got a couple of words for you, Rafe. How come you left Alison when 
she need you the most?
Rafe: I don't know.
Jamal: Couldn't have said it better myself -- "I don't know."

Rafe: I'm sorry. I don't even remember how I got here. I -- I don't remember 
any of you. I had some sort of accident. I have no memory of the last several 
years of my life.

Ian: Well, your vitals are stable. I -- I can't explain any of this. Give 
them a minute. They need some privacy, ok?
Jamal: Call us if you need us.

Alison: Please, you got -- you got to tell me the truth. What's really going 
on?
Rafe: I wish I could.

Alison: Oh -- oh, is that it? Do you -- is it some, like, sort of mission or 
something? Is it something special that God has sent you on or -- is it that?
Rafe: Why would you ask if --

Alison: Because I need some sort of explanation or some kind of reason as to 
why you are acting like we're such strangers.

Lucy: So Alison was testifying in court and she just collapsed and they 
rushed her to the hospital.
Kevin: So I came back too late to save her?

Lucy: No. No, don't do that. This is not your fault. You didn't have any 
control over when you could come back. Wait a minute. How did you make it back?
Kevin: Well, I thought you lit Rebecca's candle.

Lucy: Someone must've found a candle and lit it. Oh, my God. Doc, if they 
hadn't done that, I might've lost you forever.

Kevin: Lucy, I was in this -- this incredible place. I could have anything I 
wanted just by snapping my fingers. Except the most important thing -- I 
couldn't have you. So instead I sketched picture after picture of you until my 
fingers were numb because I wouldn't let myself forget a single thing about you.

Lucy: Oh. I -- I know! I haven't let this out of my sight. Look. Look at 
this. I think you captured me just perfectly.
Kevin: Where did you get this?

Lucy: I don't know. I found it on our deck at the lighthouse. That means 
somehow we are connected.
Kevin: Wow.

Victor: All right. Now, Simon says, "Do a pretty pirouette and dance." Lucy, 
there you are.
Lucy: Hey.

Victor: I hope you don't mind. It's such a lovely evening out, I decided to 
take the children for a pajama scavenger hunt. Monk and Ryan used to love them. 
Because you never know --
Kevin: What you might find out there.
Victor: Oh, my God!
Serena: Kevin!
Victor: Monk! Oh, Monk! Oh, God!
Livvie: Hey, where are you, Rafe?
[Knock on door]
Livvie: Thank God. Where have you --

Woman: Oh, I'm sorry. It's just Shirley from the front desk. I kind of need 
my money back.
Livvie: What money?
Shirley: The twenty that I lent your husband?
Livvie: You lent him money?
Shirley: Yeah, for cab fare.
Livvie: Oh. All right, come in.
Livvie: Did he -- did he say where he was going?
Shirley: Yeah, to look for you at the hospital.
Livvie: The hospital?
Shirley: Yeah.
Livvie: Oh.
Shirley: Are you ok?

Livvie: Yeah. Yeah, yeah. I'm -- I'm fine, ok? I just need to get dressed, so 
thanks. Thanks. Ok. I have to keep Rafe away from Alison.

Ian: This is amazing to me. Alison comes out of a coma because, why, Rafe was 
here?
Jamal: He's acting like he doesn't remember anything, though.
Jack: Do you think this, like, memory lapse is true or --

Jamal: I mean, even if it is, do you think he's going to remember about him 
and Alison?

Ian: I don't know any of that. I don't know any of that. That would take a 
full examination. Right now I got to concentrate on Alison.
Jamal: Yeah, yeah, yeah.

Ian: I'm going to get the neurologist to come down, have a look at her. He's 
not going to believe this.
Jamal: Yeah. Wow.

Jack: This is amazing. I mean, Alison was basically at death's door, and Rafe 
waking her up is like some kind of miracle.

Jamal: Yeah, I know, I know. I mean, nobody could get through to her -- not 
you, me, or her granny.
Jack: But, hey --
Jamal: Wow.
Jack: I mean, at least she's back, right?

Jamal: Yeah. Yeah, that's what's important -- Alison's back. She told me how 
close her and Rafe were, but --
Jack: You didn't want to believe it.
Jamal: No. No, but, hey, I do now. She really loves him. I'm happy for her.

Rafe: I don't get it. Is this some sort of religious thing? I mean, why do 
you keep asking me about God?

Alison: So then you really don't remember anything about me or being in Port 
Charles?

Rafe: I just woke up in the woods a few weeks ago and I don't even know how I 
got there.

Alison: The last place I left you was in the park. I was holding your hand so 
tight, I didn't want to let you go.
Rafe: Why was I leaving you?
Alison: You didn't want to, but you had no choice because your pass was up.
Rafe: My pass? Oh. Was I on leave? Was I in the military or something?
Alison: No.
Rafe: Oh. My head is really starting to spin here.

Alison: Ok, wait, just wait. Wait, listen to me. I'm sure that we can just 
talk about this later, ok, because I know that you've probably got a lot of 
questions and so do I. Ok, but just come here, just for a second. Just let me 
look at you. Please. I just want to -- I just want to look at you because I 
never thought that I would ever see you again in this lifetime.
Rafe: Why? I mean, if we were so close, why --

Alison: All you have to remember, all you have to know, is that we really 
love each other. Ok, now that you're back with me, it's all going to be ok. Now 
that we have each other. Ok?
Rafe: It's not that easy.

Alison: I'm going to make it easier, ok? I'm going to help you. I'm going to 
do everything that I can to make it -- make it right for you because as long as 
-- as long as we have each other, nobody can touch us, ok? Ok? All right.
Rafe: I can't. I can't. I can't do this.

Alison: Rafe? Rafe? Come here. It's ok. Just -- just hold me. Ok, I promise 
you it'll all come back to you, I swear it will. It will just all come back to 
you.
Rafe: No, no, no, no. I -- I can't do this.
Alison: Why?
Rafe: Because I'm married.

Victor: My God, I can't believe it. You must never, ever do whatever it is 
you did again.
Kevin: Don't worry, I won't.
Victor: What -- where were you? What happened?
Kevin: That's -- that's a long, crazy story, Victor.
Christina: Daddy, Daddy.
Kevin: Oh, honey! Oh, I thought I'd never see you guys again.

Serena: We missed you so much. We thought we were never going to see you 
again.

Kevin: Well, I guess we're all just going to have to make up for lost time, 
aren't we?
Serena: Yeah. I got backstage passes to see an N Sync concert.
Kevin: You're going to concerts?
Serena: Yeah! And little miss right here just had her birthday party.

Kevin: Well, guess what. We're going to have to have another birthday party 
because I missed the first one, so we have to do it all over again!

Lucy: And we'll have more parties and more parties and more parties to 
celebrate everything.

Kevin: Well, I guess the Collins clan is all together now, isn't it? Oh -- 
except Livvie. I've got to call Livvie. Your phone?
Lucy: You know --
Kevin: I have your phone. I'll call her.

Lucy: No, no, no, no. I'll tell you what -- why don't -- let's just wait till 
we get back to the house, ok?
Victor: You look wonderful, son.
Kevin: Well, I am wonderful -- now.
Lucy: Oh. Oh, Doc, you know that star you gave me?
Kevin: Mm-hmm?

Lucy: Look right up there, just west of Orion. That is the most beautiful 
star in the whole world.
Kevin: The most beautiful thing I've ever seen.

Lucy: Oh, Doc. That star you gave me -- boy, if I hadn't had that -- you 
know, I would look up at her at night and I would know you were looking at her, 
too, and I wasn't alone.
Kevin: I'm just so glad to be home.
Serena: Group hug. Group hug, come on.
Victor: Group hug.
Serena: Come on.
Lucy: Group hug!
Kevin: What a good idea.
Lucy: Group hug. Come here, come here, come here. Come on, come on.
Victor: Collins sandwich. Collins sandwich.
Serena: I'm getting smushed!
Ian: This is amazing to me. This is amazing.
[Phone rings]
Serena: Ah!

Kevin: Oop, oop -- that's your phone. Oop, I got it, I got it, I got it. 
Hello?
Ian: Hey, Kevin, can you put Lucy on, please? Kevin? Is it -- how did --

Kevin: Actually, I -- I don't know. I don't know if I can answer that 
question, but I'm back, and Lucy told me what you did. I'm grateful. Thank you.
Ian: No, I -- thank God. Are you all right?

Kevin: I'm fine! I'm fine! I -- I don't know. I just came back. I wish I 
could say the same for Alison. Lucy told me.

Ian: No. That's why I'm calling. Alison is out of danger. I don't know how, 
but she is and I -- this -- this truly is a day for miracles, isn't it?
Kevin: I guess so. Well, listen, I'll give Lucy the good news.

Ian: Well, what do you think, Lambert? Maybe we're finally out of all this 
darkness.

Alison: Well, at least you remembered that you were married, right? That's 
something, you know? It was a really beautiful ceremony, wasn't it?
Rafe: It was in this old barn.

Alison: I stood there with you. We promised our love to God for all of 
eternity. And remember I wore those little flowers in my hair?
Rafe: No.

Alison: Yeah, the little purple ones, remember? And I'll never forget the 
look on your face the very first time you called me your wife.
Rafe: No, no, no, no. What I -- I mean, it wasn't you.

Alison: Of course it was me. Rafe? It was me. Who -- who else do you think 
that you married?

Livvie: Me, Alison. See? Yeah, we -- we haven't sent out the announcements 
yet, but Rafe is married to me now. So would you mind getting your hands off my 
husband, please?
>> On the next "Port Charles" --
Karen: I don't feel like being good.
[Ricky chuckles]

Livvie: You hated me so much for taking Rafe away from you, you killed my 
father.
Kevin: Honey, she didn't kill me. I'm right here.
